stimulusHtml: For a person standing outside of the Great Mosque of Isfahan, the dominant visual element of the mosque is
choicesHtml: the pathway through a chahar bagh garden that leads to the mosque
a monumental gate that is ornamented with calligraphy from the Qurâ€™an
the pair of cylindrical minarets that indicate the direction of Islamic prayer
an open-air courtyard with a large fountain rising from the middle
